entry.title: Podcasts
entry.content:
(Eng-Tr) List of the best podcasts

List of the best podcasts I have listened so far. I will update this list as I listen more.

But before my list, Lets see the best podcasts:

The best podcasts

  • The Joe Rogan Experience
  • The Tim Ferriss Show
  • 99% Invisible
  • Invisibilia
  • Radiolab
  • Stuff You Should Know
  • Freakonomics Radio
  • Working
  • How to be Awesome at Your Job
  • Acquired
  • That Creative Life
  • Discovery
  • TED Talks
  • TED Radio Hour
  • Surprisingly Awesome
  • Flash Forward
  • Serial
  • Story of the Day : NPR
  • Intelligence Squared
  • Story Collider
